statements: SELECT id, timestamp, sensor_name, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(value) as average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT MAX(value) as max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'humidity';
SELECT timestamp, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, sensor_name, value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND value > 50 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT timestamp, sensor_name, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING max_value > 100;
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY avg_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY total_records DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_value > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, reading_value FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT * FROM factory_status WHERE machine_status = 'Running' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, machine_status FROM factory_status WHERE machine_status = 'Running';
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, reading_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading_value FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Factory A' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, shelf_life FROM Products WHERE shelf_life > 30;
SELECT machine_name, status FROM Machines WHERE status = 'Operational' ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM Sensors;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT machine_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Machines WHERE status = 'Operational' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM Sensors WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY reading_value DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_date, shelf_life FROM Products WHERE category = 'Food' AND shelf_life < 30 ORDER BY shelf_life ASC, production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM machine_status WHERE status = 'offline';
SELECT machine_name, last_update FROM machine_status ORDER BY last_update ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, total_time FROM production_history WHERE production_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_time FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT machine_type, last_update, status FROM machine_status WHERE status = 'offline' ORDER BY last_update ASC
SELECT product_name, production_date, quantity, total_time FROM production_history WHERE quantity > 1000 ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT alarm_type, machine_id, sensor_id, alarm_time FROM alarm_logs WHERE alarm_type = 'critical' ORDER BY alarm_time ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data JOIN machine_status ON sensor_data.sensor_id = machine_status.machine_id ORDER BY reading_time DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, country FROM plants ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, sensor_name FROM locations l JOIN sensors s ON l.location_id = s.location_id;
SELECT MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM readings;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT plant_name, country FROM plants WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, timestamp FROM sensors JOIN readings ON sensors.sensor_id = readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, alarm_type, description FROM sensors JOIN alarms ON sensors.sensor_id = alarms.sensor_id WHERE alarms.alarm_type = 'Critical';
